divs: Sighting DetailsIt took place in Moline,Illinois as we walked away from our home to take a walk we were looking at stars me,my brother Mike,and his two friends Chris and Jeff, mysister too it blinked rocking back & forth then it flew to Joh Deere Middle School, then it turned around and chased us we ran fast as we could back home but did not make it home it caught up with us and hovered abouve a tree pushing the branches down hard the branches blew around hard,all the sudden I and my brother were frozen in running action 3 ft off the ground and my sister was watching us from a distance,I could NOT move my body at all, all I could move was my kneck,I thought I would never ever see home ever again and it traumatized me I was 16 yrs old then I am age 54 now.Then I got away and ran home, I never felt the same, scared to go out on walks at nite after that. Then yrs later I have reason to believe that same UFO landed in my fathers field and I had a conversation with the Alien, he looked like a man, he kept coming back over and over and my dog nearly got killed by him, he looked EXACTLY LIKE A MAN BUT GREEN with EXTREAMLY POINTED EARS,we had a long conversation, later we all moved.I know who they are now and why they come here and I plan on going back there I also plan on writing a book and contacting Steven Spielburg and I am NOT SHARING ANYMORE INFO. Would someone pleeeease send Steven Spielburg my way so I can heal,for some reason I am thinking about the terrible time I had trying hard to get away, and yes its bothering me.Last sighting I had which was the 2nd time it was when I was 19 yrs old, I plan on having a movie made with the help of Steven Spielburg I hope he contacts me so people will have some answers, people that are wondering whats going on why the UFO's keep coming back I have the answer now.I went there yrs later with my kids when they were ages 13 & 14 and a kid that lives in my parents old home said it still comes there,that thats why his dad plaqnted those tall skinny trees that look like hedges by their drive way and that thats why his dad built a huge red barn like shed, so that no one could see out into the field !!! I wish they would move anyway I'm going back their this summer. but I refuse to say,because I want badly to write a movie with Spielburg so don't ask me,that was in the yr 1998, keep in mind this 2nd encounter was only me, but that yrs later a family moved in that home, and their son with blond hair and blue eyes told me that UFO still comes there he told me that in 1998 !!! so its 4 witness's for the 1st story told and not sure how many witness's for the 2nd story.So I put the number 5 this means 4 my brother 1 his friends 2 more my sister 1 for the first story and at my parents old home in the country me as 1 witness and a hand full that took pictures of the green grass that turned all hay color brown 5 places out in that field and now in 1998 a tall tall kid comes out of that home and tells me that that UFO lands out in that field. Theres also another UFO I believe its the same one that goes out on that long road up and down from Alpha Illinois back to Coal Valley and THE MOLINE, ILLINOIS >> Air Port Road not over the airport though its that long road going from Moline threw Coal Vally all they way out to Alpha Illinois out by my Uncle Neds Farm ! Debbie
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Moline
There were no other sightings in Moline on or around June 1st 1975
Summary: It had bright lights a they froze me and my brother in running action 3 ft off the ground sister saw us I saw myself too
